description: N. Samantha Prasanna De Costa Vs. Thushara Chaminda Kariyawasam and another. before Hon. K. M. S. DISSANAYAKE, J
parties: N. Samantha Prasanna De Costa Vs. Thushara Chaminda Kariyawasam and another.
judgement_by: Hon. K. M. S. DISSANAYAKE, J
keywords: Appeal-Can an objection be taken by the Respondent to an application made to Court by the competent authority that the Respondent is not the Competent Authority within the meaning of the State Land (Recovery of Possession) Act No. 07 of 1979 as amended.
legistation: Article 138 of the Constitution of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka-State Land (Recovery of Possession) Act No. 07 1979 (as amended) Sections 3, 4, 5(1), 6, 7, 8, 9(1) and 9(2) and 10-Section 3, 22,23,24 and Schedule B of the Mahaweli Authority of Sri Lanka Act No. 23 of 1979.
